name: Ice Skating Race: Frozen Village Snow Drop Pro
name_original: Ice Skating Race: Frozen Village Snow Drop Pro
description:
It's gaming time and you're ready for action! Are you ready to test your speed and dexterity? If so, then you'll love this ice skating game. Don't let it fool you! You might be small, but it's a fast game and you'll need all the agility and concentration you can muster!

Move your way through the strange environment and collect colorful objects as your journey continues. Be careful, though! It's a dangerous world out there and there are lots of obstacles that want to stand in your way. Avoid them or it's game over for you!

Tilt the device to make him move and change directions as you waddle your way through the game. Enjoy endless gameplay and cute characters that are fun for the whole family! The game supports Game Center leaderboards, too, so you can show everyone your highest score!


Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
